Error message gets displayed on clicking Submit using agent login without choosing the new plan and entering reason and the field values gets resets on clicking reset in the Change Plan page of the CRM application where Plans are displayed from CBOS

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether "Last Plan Change less than or equal to the minimum period..." error message gets displayed on clicking Approve in the Change plan page using the admin login when the last plan change date is less than the Minimum plan change date mentioned in the RRBS_TARIFF_PLAN table of the CRM application.
